Becoming a Wizard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Wizard Traits table.
  • Gain the Wizard's level 1 features, which are listed in the Wizard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die from the Core Wizard Traits table.
  • Gain the Wizard's level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{Wizard Features table}. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{multiclassing rules} to determine your available spell slots.

Expanding and Replacing a Spellbook

The spells you add to your spellbook as you gain levels reflect your ongoing magical research, but you might find other spells during your adventures that you can add to the book. You could discover a Wizard spell on a Spell Scroll, for example, and then copy it into your spellbook.

Copying a Spell into the Book. When you find a level 1+ Wizard spell, you can copy it into your spellbook if it's of a level you can prepare and if you have time to copy it. For each level of the spell, the transcription takes 2 hours and costs 50 GP. Afterward you can prepare the spell like the other spells in your spellbook.

Copying the Book. You can copy a spell from your spellbook into another book. This is like copying a new spell into your spellbook but faster, since you already know how to cast the spell. You need spend only 1 hour and 10 GP for each level of the copied spell.

If you lose your spellbook, you can use the same procedure to transcribe the Wizard spells that you have prepared into a new spellbook. Filling out the remainder of the new book requires you to find new spells to do so. For this reason, many wizards keep a backup spellbook.

Scholar.title: 学者
Scholar.hint: 学习法术之余，你也在钻研其他的学术领域，从下列技能中选择一项你具有熟练的技能：奥秘、历史、自然或宗教，你获得该技能的专精。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
As a student of arcane magic, you have learned to cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.b2QVn25z2N1ykWpf]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Wizard spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard spell list}.

Cantrips. You know three Wizard cantrips of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofFrost]{Ray of Frost} are recommended. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one of your cantrips from this feature with another Wizard cantrip of your choice.

When you reach Wizard levels 4 and 10, you learn another Wizard cantrip of your choice, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{Wizard Features table}.

Spellbook. Your wizardly apprenticeship culminated in the creation of a unique book: your spellbook. It is a Tiny object that weighs 3 pounds, contains 100 pages, and can be read only by you or someone casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}. You determine the book's appearance and materials, such as a gilt-edged tome or a collection of vellum bound with twine.

The book contains the level 1+ spells you know. It starts with six level 1 Wizard spells of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Wizard level after 1, add two Wizard spells of your choice to your spellbook. Each of these spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots, as shown in the Wizard Features table. The spells are the culmination of arcane research you do regularly.

Spell Slots. The Wizard Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To do so, choose four spells from your spellbook. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Wizard levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Wizard Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Wizard spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Wizard, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination, chosen from your spellbook.

If another Wizard feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Wizard spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your list of prepared spells, replacing any of the spells there with spells from your spellbook.

Spellcasting Ability. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your Wizard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus or your spellbook as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.

Ritual Adept.name: Ritual Adept
Ritual Adept.description: You can cast any spell as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.YSB1QtxZW2BI9f4Y#casting-without-slots]{Ritual} if that spell has the Ritual tag and the spell is in your spellbook. You needn't have the spell prepared, but you must read from the book to cast a spell in this way.

Reduced Movement.name: 降低速度
Reduced Movement.description: 直至施法者的下一回合开始，你的速度减少 10 尺。

Shocking Grasp.name: 电爪
Shocking Grasp.description:
你放出闪电，击向一名你试图触碰的生物。对目标发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]伤害，并且在其下一回合开始前不能执行借机攻击。

Shocked.name: 震荡
Shocked.description: 你在你的下一回合开始前不能执行借机攻击。

Sleep.name: 睡眠术
Sleep.description:
以施法距离内一点为源点，5 尺半径球状区域内每个你选择的生物都必须成功通过一次感知豁免否则直到其下个回合结束陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。在其下个回合结束时，它必须重复此豁免。如果目标第二次豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入&Reference[unconscious]如果目标受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将它摇醒，目标身上的法术结束。

不会睡眠的生物，比如精灵或免疫力竭状态的生物自动成功通过对抗此法术的豁免。

Sleeping.name: 昏睡
Sleeping.description: 你直至下一回合结束前陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{失能}状态。在下一回合结束时，你必须重复此豁免。若你的豁免再次失败，你在持续时间内陷入&Reference[unconscious]{昏迷}如果你受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将你摇醒，你自身上的法术结束。

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
你施放出一道雷鸣能量。在以你为源点 15 尺立方区域内的每名生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d8 点雷鸣伤害，并被推离 10 尺。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。

此外，所有完全位于该区域内且未被固定住的物件都将被推离 10 尺。该法术还会发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就提高 1d8。

Scholar.name: Scholar
Scholar.description: While studying magic, you also specialized in another field of study. Choose one of the following skills in which you have proficiency: Arcana, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, or Religion. You have Expertise in the chosen skill.

Color Spray.name: Color Spray
Color Spray.description: 你射出一道炫目的闪耀彩光。以你为源点的 15 尺锥状区域内的每个生物必须成功通过一次体质豁免，否则陷入 &Reference[blinded apply=false] 状态直至你的下一回合结束。

Tasha's Hideous Laughter.name: 塔莎狂笑术
Tasha's Hideous Laughter.description:
施法距离内你可见的一名生物进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[prone apply=false] 和 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态。在此期间，若目标能够发笑，则它会不受控制地狂笑，且无法结束自身的倒地Prone状态。

目标在其每回合结束或受到伤害时，可以再进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免。如果豁免是因受到伤害所致，则该次豁免具有优势。豁免成功，法术终止。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以额外指定一个目标。

materials.value: 一块甜馅饼和一根羽毛

Uncontrollable Laughter.name: 难抑狂笑
Uncontrollable Laughter.description:
在持续时间内，目标陷入&Reference[prone apply=false]和 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。在此期间，只要它能够发笑，它就会不受控制地狂笑，并且无法结束自身的倒地状态。

在其每回合结束或受到伤害时，目标可以再进行一次[[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]]豁免。如果豁免是因受到伤害所致，则该次豁免具有优势。豁免成功时，法术终止。

Evoker.name: Evoker
Evoker.description:
Create Explosive Elemental Effects

Your studies focus on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid. Some Evokers find employment in military forces, serving as artillery to blast armies from afar. Others use their power to protect others, while some seek their own gain.

Evocation Savant.name: Evocation Savant
Evocation Savant.description:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Evocation school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Evocation school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Potent Cantrip.name: Potent Cantrip
Potent Cantrip.description:
Your damaging cantrips affect even creatures that avoid the brunt of the effect. When you cast a cantrip at a creature and you miss with the attack roll or the target succeeds on a saving throw against the cantrip, the target takes half the cantrip's damage (if any) but suffers no additional effect from the cantrip.

Foundry Note

With their token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Melf's Acid Arrow.name: 马友夫强酸箭
Melf's Acid Arrow.description:
一支闪烁的绿色箭矢朝一个施法距离内的目标疾速飞去，并喷射出一注强酸。法术对目标发动一次远程法术攻击。若命中，则目标立即受到 4d4 点强酸伤害，并在其下一回合结束时再受到 2d4 点强酸伤害。若未命中，则箭矢以酸液溅射目标，仅造成初始伤害一半的伤害。

Lingering Acid.name: 强酸附着
Lingering Acid.description: 若命中，则目标立即受到 4d4 点强酸伤害，并在其下一回合结束时再受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=acid]] 伤害。若未命中，则箭矢以酸液溅射目标，仅造成初始伤害一半的伤害。

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Shatter.name: 粉碎音波
Shatter.description:
一阵震耳欲聋的噪音在你指定的施法距离内一点上爆发出来。以该点为中心半径 10 尺球状区域内的所有生物必须要进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点雷鸣伤害；豁免成功受到半数伤害。构装生物进行该豁免时具有劣势。

如果法术的范围内存在不被任何生物着装携带的非魔法物件，则它也要受到该伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术伤害就增加 1d8。

Spellbook.name: Spellbook
Spellbook.description:
Your spellbook contains the level 1+ spells you know.

When you begin play, choose four spells from among the level 1+ Spell Cards listed on your class board’s “What You Need to Play” section (five if you are level 2, six if you are level 3). These cards make up your prepared spells. Don’t include spells from your Background Card or Species Card.

Put the spells you haven’t prepared in a pile under this card, and stack your prepared spells near your Class Board.

Recommended Spells. The first time you play, prepare these spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}.

Becoming a Wizard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Wizard Traits table.
  • Gain the Wizard's level 1 features, which are listed in the Wizard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die from the Core Wizard Traits table.
  • Gain the Wizard's level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{Wizard Features table}. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{multiclassing rules} to determine your available spell slots.

Expanding and Replacing a Spellbook

The spells you add to your spellbook as you gain levels reflect your ongoing magical research, but you might find other spells during your adventures that you can add to the book. You could discover a Wizard spell on a Spell Scroll, for example, and then copy it into your spellbook.

Copying a Spell into the Book. When you find a level 1+ Wizard spell, you can copy it into your spellbook if it's of a level you can prepare and if you have time to copy it. For each level of the spell, the transcription takes 2 hours and costs 50 GP. Afterward you can prepare the spell like the other spells in your spellbook.

Copying the Book. You can copy a spell from your spellbook into another book. This is like copying a new spell into your spellbook but faster, since you already know how to cast the spell. You need spend only 1 hour and 10 GP for each level of the copied spell.

If you lose your spellbook, you can use the same procedure to transcribe the Wizard spells that you have prepared into a new spellbook. Filling out the remainder of the new book requires you to find new spells to do so. For this reason, many wizards keep a backup spellbook.

Scholar.title: 学者
Scholar.hint: 学习法术之余，你也在钻研其他的学术领域，从下列技能中选择一项你具有熟练的技能：奥秘、历史、自然或宗教，你获得该技能的专精。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
As a student of arcane magic, you have learned to cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.b2QVn25z2N1ykWpf]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Wizard spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard spell list}.

Cantrips. You know three Wizard cantrips of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofFrost]{Ray of Frost} are recommended. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one of your cantrips from this feature with another Wizard cantrip of your choice.

When you reach Wizard levels 4 and 10, you learn another Wizard cantrip of your choice, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{Wizard Features table}.

Spellbook. Your wizardly apprenticeship culminated in the creation of a unique book: your spellbook. It is a Tiny object that weighs 3 pounds, contains 100 pages, and can be read only by you or someone casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}. You determine the book's appearance and materials, such as a gilt-edged tome or a collection of vellum bound with twine.

The book contains the level 1+ spells you know. It starts with six level 1 Wizard spells of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Wizard level after 1, add two Wizard spells of your choice to your spellbook. Each of these spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots, as shown in the Wizard Features table. The spells are the culmination of arcane research you do regularly.

Spell Slots. The Wizard Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To do so, choose four spells from your spellbook. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Wizard levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Wizard Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Wizard spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Wizard, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination, chosen from your spellbook.

If another Wizard feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Wizard spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your list of prepared spells, replacing any of the spells there with spells from your spellbook.

Spellcasting Ability. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your Wizard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus or your spellbook as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.

Ritual Adept.name: Ritual Adept
Ritual Adept.description: You can cast any spell as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.YSB1QtxZW2BI9f4Y#casting-without-slots]{Ritual} if that spell has the Ritual tag and the spell is in your spellbook. You needn't have the spell prepared, but you must read from the book to cast a spell in this way.

Arcane Recovery.name: Arcane Recovery
Arcane Recovery.description:
You can regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook. When you finish a Short Rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level equal to no more than half your Wizard level (round up), and none of the slots can be level 6 or higher. For example, if you're a level 4 Wizard, you can recover up to two levels' worth of spell slots, regaining either one level 2 spell slot or two level 1 spell slots.

Once you use this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

Combined Level Available: [[(@classes.wizard.levels / 2)]]

Foundry Note

Since you can select the slots you will have to manually adjust your available slots. This feature can be used to track the one-time use though.

Burning Hands.name: Burning Hands
Burning Hands.description:
你向前喷射出一片火焰。处于 15 尺锥状区域内的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者受到 [[/damage 3d6 type=fire]]伤害，豁免成功者受到一半伤害。

在此锥状区域内的未被着装或携带的易燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法：你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，此法术的伤害就会提升 1d6。

Feather Fall.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If a creature lands before the spell ends, the creature takes no damage from the fall, and the spell ends for that creature.

activation.condition: 你或距你 60 尺内的可见生物坠落时可用

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础AC变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。当目标穿上护甲时，此法术将提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Magic Missile.name: 魔法飞弹
Magic Missile.description:
你创造三枚由魔法力场形成的闪光飞镖，并让每发飞镖袭向施法距离内你能看见的指定生物。每发飞镖对目标造成 1d4 + 1 的力场伤害。所有飞镖将同时袭向目标，而你还可以指定它们击中同一个目标或是分别击中几个目标。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，该法术就会多制造出一支飞镖。

[[2 + @item.level]]{环阶 [[lookup @item.level]] 飞弹}

施法距离内你可见的一名生物进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[prone apply=false] 和 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态。在此期间，若目标能够发笑，则它会不受控制地狂笑，且无法结束自身的倒地Prone状态。

目标在其每回合结束或受到伤害时，可以再进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免。如果豁免是因受到伤害所致，则该次豁免具有优势。豁免成功，法术终止。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以额外指定一个目标。

materials.value: 一块甜馅饼和一根羽毛

Xanthe.description:

Elf Hermit

One of the Borderlands’ oldest and wisest residents was banished from the keep for crimes she didn’t commit.

Bad Reputation. Xanthe was wrongfully exiled for using occult magic.

Distrustful. Xanthe doesn’t trust strangers.

Rumors

“A spy named Jacko prowls the fens. Be wary if you meet him. He’ll do anything for coin—even kill.” (True)

“The temple’s head priest is a demon worshiper.” (Partially true; Xanthe is referring to Ivlis, the former priest)

Yvette.description:

Human Bank Guard

This corrupt guard exploits her station for selfish ends.

Bitter. Yvette thinks the world owes her.

Grifter. Yvette is always hunting for new ways to get rich quick.

Rumors

“If you find yourself face to face with an owlbear, just play dead. It will quickly get bored and move on.” (False)

Bandit.description:
Criminal and Scoundrel

Bandits use the threat of violence to take what they want. Such criminals include gang members, desperadoes, and lawless mercenaries. Yet not all bandits are motivated by greed. Some are driven to lives of crime by unjust laws, desperation, or the threats of merciless leaders.

Doomsayer and Fanatic

Engulf.name: 吞没
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time. The cube can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures if it has room inside itself to contain them.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], each creature whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters for the first time during this move.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is engulfed. An engulfed target has the &Reference[restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[total cover apply=false], can't cast spells, and takes [[/damage]] Acid damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. An engulfed target can try to escape by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc]] check. On a successful check, the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

Success: Half damage, and the target moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s. If there is no unoccupied space, the target fails the save instead.

Big Bright Bug

A giant fire beetle takes its name from its pair of glowing glands that give off light. Miners and adventurers prize these creatures, for a giant fire beetle’s glands continue to shed light for [[/r 1d6]] days after the beetle dies.

Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 变形为如同中型或小型物件，并保留其游戏数据；或[[lookup @name lowercase]]变回其真实斑点形态。[[lookup @name lowercase]]着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。

Minotaur of Baphomet.name: 巴弗灭的牛头人
Minotaur of Baphomet.description:
Berserker of the Demon Lord of Beasts

Baphomet, Demon Lord of Beasts, claims to have created minotaurs and demands their worship. These brutes resemble the hulking, horned demon lord more than others of their kind, and they wreak havoc in that foul immortal’s name. Rarely, non-minotaurs cursed by magic-users or spiteful deities might transform into these monsters.

Gore.name: 顶撞
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了 10+ 尺且目标生物体型不超过大型，则其额外受到 10（3d6）穿刺伤害并陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若巴弗灭的牛头人使用了移动攻击特性且你的体型不超过大型，你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Noble.name: 贵族
Noble.description:
Royal and Rich Folk

Nobles encompass a variety of people with social influence. They might be rulers, wealthy merchants, callous bureaucrats, or the idle elite.

NPC Creature Sizes

If you use this card to represent an NPC, the NPC’s size depends on the species listed on their NPC Card as follows:

Dwarf: Medium

Elf: Medium

Halfling: Small

Human: Medium

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Nothic.name: 诺斯怪
Nothic.description:
Witness to the Weird

Consumed by their thirst for forbidden knowledge, nothics are cursed lore seekers transformed by secrets never meant to be known. The bodies of these former scholars are warped into otherworldly shapes, each with a head dominated by a gigantic, unblinking eye.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item Claw]] 攻击。

Rotting Gaze.name: 腐朽凝视
Rotting Gaze.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功：半伤。

Weird Insight.name: 怪异洞悉
Weird Insight.description:
感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物。

失败：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 魔法性的得知一件与目标相关的事实或秘密。

Ogre.name: 食人魔
Ogre.description:
Raging Hulk and Hoarder

Ogres are 10-foot-tall brutes that overwhelm their foes and take what spoils they please. Ogre raiders ally with other evil forces in return for food, riches, and promises of battle.

Ogre Zombie.name: 食人魔丧尸
Ogre Zombie.description:
Relentless Reanimated Corpse

Ogre zombies serve as tireless labor and undying weapons of war. These massive zombies possess the size and strength to break through barriers that repel smaller zombies.

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 因非光耀非重击伤害导致生命值降为 0 时，其进行一次体质豁免检定（DC 为 5 + 所受伤害）。豁免成功则改为将生命值降至 1。

Owlbear.name: 枭熊
Owlbear.description:
Magically Perfected Predator

Created long ago by mages, owlbears combine keen avian eyes, thick feathers, and a tearing beak with a mighty bearlike frame. Despite their magical origins, owlbears have propagated and spread to wildernesses across the multiverse. They are tenacious hunters that might track prey over miles and rarely give up their hunts.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Red Dragon Wyrmling.name: 红龙雏龙
Red Dragon Wyrmling.description:
Dragon of Greed and Devastation

Red dragon wyrmlings are born destroyers. From a young age, they delight in igniting objects and creatures alike. They sometimes restrain themselves from scorching creatures to instead bully others into following their orders and bringing them gifts.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Skeleton.name: 骷髅
Skeleton.description:
Ossified Evil

Skeletons are reanimated Humanoid bones bearing the equipment they had in life. They have rudimentary faculties and greater agility than zombies and similar shambling corpses.

Sprite Skirmisher.name: Sprite Skirmisher
Sprite Skirmisher.description:
Elusive Defender of Fey Realms

Sprites are wee spirits of nature that can see the innate goodness or wickedness of other creatures. Those that enter their realms with good intentions might be treated with tiny feasts and celebrations. The wicked face nasty tricks and bold ambushes at the hands of invisible sprite defenders.

Enchanting Bow.name: 惑控之弓
Enchanting Bow.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态，直至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合开始。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态，直至小仙灵的下一回合开始。

Heart Sight.name: 真心视界
Heart Sight.description:
魅力豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的生物（此豁免天族、邪魔、亡灵自动失败）。

失败：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 获悉目标的情绪与阵营。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{隐形术} 于自身，无需法术成分并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

FAek73jM5CyQOO60.name: Invisibility
FAek73jM5CyQOO60.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Blurred Form.name: 朦胧形态
Blurred Form.description: 除非 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 陷入失能状态，否则对其进行的攻击检定具有劣势。

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在死亡时爆炸。

敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]，源自[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Steam Breath.name: 蒸汽吐息
Steam Breath.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害，并且目标的速度降低 10 尺，持续至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合结束。

成功：半伤。

失败或成功：在水下无法对这种火焰伤害具有抗性。

Stirge.name: 蚊蝠
Stirge.description:
Notorious, Clinging Bloodsucker

Stirges are bat-size vermin with dagger-length proboscises that attach to other creatures and drain life from them. Stirges are most active at night and hide in shadowy places during the day. If disturbed, they take flight and defend themselves.

Proboscis.name: 长喙
Proboscis.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且[[lookup @name lowercase]]会吸附在目标身上。 [[lookup @name lowercase]]吸附期间，其无法发动长喙攻击，且目标在[[lookup @name lowercase]]回合开始时受到[[/damage average activity=5xwoPMBiaRBqjFav]]伤害。

[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以消耗 5 尺移动力解除吸附。目标或其 5 尺内的生物可以用动作来解除[[lookup @name lowercase]]的吸附。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmNecroticSword0]] 或 [[/item .mmNecroticBow000]] 发动共计两次攻击。其可以将其中一次攻击替换为使用 [[/item .mmLifeDrain00000]] 。

Drink Life.name: Drink Life
Drink Life.description:
Life Drain.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FA4Mt9cXsYfHDDcs]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=FA4Mt9cXsYfHDDcs]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=FA4Mt9cXsYfHDDcs]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

Zombie.name: 丧尸
Zombie.description:
Relentless Animated Corpse

Zombies are unthinking, reanimated corpses, often gruesomely marred by decay. They serve whatever supernatural force animates them—typically evil necromancers or fiendish spirits.

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 因受非光耀非重击伤害而使其生命值减至 0 时, 它必须进行一次 DC 为 5＋所受伤害值的体质豁免。 豁免成功时, 则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 生命值降至 1。
